English: Allows control of building levels by district and/or building.
Advanced Building Level Control
Level Control
Control levels
Level control not available for this building type
Minimum level
The minimum permitted building level for this building.
Maximum level
The maximum permitted building level for this building.
Residential levels
The minimum permitted building level for residential buildings in this district.
The maximum permitted building level for residential buildings in this district.
Workplace levels
The minimum permitted building level for workplace buildings (industrial/commercial/office) in this district.
The maximum permitted building level for workplace buildings (industrial/commercial/office) in this district.
Random spawn levels
When set, new buildings in this district will have a starting level randomly selected between the minimum and maximum for this district.
New buildings historical
When set, new buildings in this district will be automatically marked as historical. Does not affect existing buildings.
Force upgrade
Forces this building to upgrade to the specified minimum.
Forces all buildings in this district with levels below the specified minimum to upgrade to that minimum.
Force downgrade
Forces this building to downgrade to the specified maximum.
Forces all buildings in this district with levels above the specified maximum to downgrade to that maximum.
Historical settings
Force historical
Makes all buildings in this district historical.
Clear historical
Makes all buildings in this district not historical.
Clear building settings
Clears all individual building level settings in this district.
Panel options
Gameplay options
Show panel on building selection
Place ABLC panel on right of game info panel (instead of on left)
No abandonment for all buildings
No abandonment for historical buildings
Randomize building appearance within +/- 1 building level
Apply additional randomization to building appearance changes
Permit non-historical buildings to upgrade as if historical if no other model is available
Check all map buildings on load and fix any illegal levels
These mods must be removed before Advanced Building Level Control can operate.
